name: Gum Gum King Kong Gatling

trigger.text: KO up to 1 of your opponent's characters with 5000 Power or less.

text: Main: Give up to 1 of your leader or characters +3000 Power. Then, if your opponent has a character with 7000 Power or more, give up to 1 of your Leaders or Characters +1000 Power for the turn.

effect.text: Give up to 1 of your leader or characters +3000 Power. Then, if your opponent has a character with 7000 Power or more, give up to 1 of your Leaders or Characters +1000 Power for the turn.
KO up to 1 of your opponent's characters with 5000 Power or less.
